price: Wala usisema kamwe kwa jambo lolote lile: Hakika nitalifanya hilo kesho
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا
footnotes: Wala usiseme kabisa kwa jambo unalo azimia kulendea na kujihimu kulitenda: Mimi nitalifanya hilo baadae!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
